page.title: 10GRANGETOWN BOYS CLUB
page.content: The present club building was built in 1970 but the club itself is much older.The first leader of the club was {Charlie Smailes.}The idea for the club came about during the second world war as an attempt to keep the boys off the streets during the black outs.The club has a membership of 604 the age limit being 14 and over,those under 14 may become junior members.The club is open 12 hours a day and seven days a week. The club is run by{Cleveland Education {Committee.}There are 17 different activities undertaken in the club covering sport,drama and crafts.The most popular activity is 5-a-side football.Attendance at the club is approximately 250 to 300 per day.
